title: Rishi Sunak – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson Withdrawing from Conservative Leadership
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rishi Sunak, the Conservative MP for Richmond, on Twitter on 23 October 2022.
content:
Boris Johnson delivered Brexit and the great vaccine roll-out.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance

He led our country through some of the toughest challenges we have ever faced, and then took on Putin and his barbaric war in Ukraine.
